description: Numbers n such that string 3,6 occurs in the base 10 representation of n but not of n-1.
mathematica: Transpose[SequencePosition[Table[If[SequenceCount[IntegerDigits[n],{3,6}]>0,1,0],{n,4000}],{0,1}]][[2]] (* The program uses the SequencePosition and SequenceCount functions from Mathematica version 10 *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 10 2016 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
